name: THE FOLLOWER (Jazda)
description:
This is the story of Emily. 

A young girl whose house is being watched by mysterious stalker third day in a row. Finally she decides to go to nearest police station and report everything. Also her best friend seems not to answer for her letters. Better check it out... 

Will Emily make it?

List of updates:
